items.title: NIMBYs Threaten a Plan to Build More Suburban Housing
items.abstract: Whether they like it or not, New York officials fighting to maintain exclusionary housing policies are on the wrong side of history.

items.title: Street Parking Permits in New York City? They’re on Legislature’s List.
items.abstract: New York State lawmakers’ proposed budget called for higher taxes on the ultrawealthy, parking permits for city residents and retention of the state’s bail laws.

items.title: Hochul’s $227 Billion Budget Plan Targets New York City’s Urgent Needs
items.abstract: Gov. Kathy Hochul’s budget proposal included a multiyear plan to help bail out the city’s ailing subway system and address the migrant crisis.

items.title: The Elusive Dream of Owning a Home in New York City
items.abstract: For many middle- and working-class New Yorkers, it’s an even more distant possibility than it used to be.

items.title: The Curious World of NFT Real Estate and Design
items.abstract: People are selling and buying art, furniture and even houses and land that exist only virtually.
